name: Tagbar
description: Vim plugin that displays tags in a window, ordered by scope

options.name: tagbar_ctags_bin
options.description: Use this option to specify the location of your ctags executable. Only needed if it is not in one of the directories in your $PATH environment variable.

options.name: tagbar_left
options.description: By default the Tagbar window will be opened on the right-hand side of vim. Set this option to open it on the left instead.

options.name: tagbar_width
options.description: Width of the Tagbar window in characters.
